abstract: Reports by search marketers show gains for Bing and suggest that an uptick in search-engine advertising is under way.
snippet: Reports by search marketers show gains for Bing and suggest that an uptick in search-engine advertising is under way.
lead_paragraph: How well did Google do? That’s the main question in the minds of investors and search advertisers every three months as the company gets ready to announce quarterly financial results.

headline.main: Studies Point to Growth for Search Ads, and for Bing

abstract: The Federal Trade Commission is no longer pursuing its inquiry into the two companies’ connections.
snippet: The Federal Trade Commission is no longer pursuing its inquiry into the two companies’ connections.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  In a move that severs another tie between Google and Apple, Arthur D. Levinson, the former chief executive of Genentech, has resigned from Google’s board.

headline.main: Google and Apple Eliminate Another Link Tie
headline.print_headline: Google And Apple Eliminate Another Tie

abstract: Google said Monday that Arthur D. Levinson, the former chief executive of Genentech, is leaving its board of directors.
snippet: Google said Monday that Arthur D. Levinson, the former chief executive of Genentech, is leaving its board of directors.

headline.main: Levinson Leaves Google Board Amid F.T.C. Inquiry
